Title: Mens Guess Horizon chronograph leather strap watch W0380G4
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Mens Guess Horizon chronograph leather strap watch W0380G4 RRP £159.00 Now £99.00 Description The large round dial on this men’s Guess Horizon watch measures approximately 45mm and has a chronograph feature on the dial. Luminous hands mark the time on the taupe coloured dial and rose gold coloured Roman numerals mark each hour. Rose gold plated stainless casing surrounds the dial and the colour ties in well with the buckle and the crown on the watch as well as the roman numerals. The strap measures approximately 22mm in width and has a patent croc effect genuine leather strap. The strap length is easily adjusted and secured in place by the traditional buckle. The Guess logo is situated just below the 12 o’clock position on the dial and the watch is supplied in all of the official original branded Guess packaging. Every watch has a two year manufacturer’s warranty and Chapelle offer at least 30% off the RRP of every product in store and online. Chapelle specialise in surplus and discontinued lines so hurry before your favourite watch goes out of stock! Chapelle reference 08910178. Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. We purchase at the best possible prices and pass on these savings to our customers. All our items are new and perfect goods; we do not sell seconds or second-hand items. We are authorised stockists of all the brands we sell so you can be confident you're buying from a reputable company. Delivery Orders dispatched within the UK will be sent using Royal Mail Recorded Signed For first class. Orders being sent to international destinations will be sent by Royal Mail International Signed For delivery. Visit our ebay store for our full range >>
